definition: (of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: This is what the government is doing to its people.
sentences.chinese: 这就是辛巴威政府对人民做的好事。

sentences.english: They wanted journalists to come here with a pack of intelligence guys.
sentences.chinese: 他们想把一整批情报人员混在记者群中送进辛巴威来。

sentences.english: Bantu-speaking people who live primarily around the city of Bulawayo, Zimbabwe.
sentences.chinese: 原居住于辛巴威布拉瓦约附近的操班图语民族。
三位记者都是辛巴威的公民。

sentences.english: These outlets have all found innovative ways around the Zimbabwean government's restrictive laws.
sentences.chinese: 这些媒体都找到办法，避过辛巴威法律的严苛规定。

sentences.english: Zimbabwe has experienced a decade of chronic food shortages.
sentences.chinese: 十年来，辛巴威经历了长期的食品短缺。

sentences.english: How fast did the economy turn?
They left Zimbabwe by car with almost nothing.
sentences.chinese: 当他们坐车离开辛巴威时简直身无分文。

definition: Kinshasa, capital of the Democratic Republic of the Congo (Tw)

pinyin: Ba1 bu4 ya4 Niu3 Ji1 nei4 ya4

definition: Kenya (Tw) (written as 肯尼亞|肯尼亚 in PRC)
